mask.\""},{"lineNumber":116439,"originalJapaneseLine":"「とにかく」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Anyway,\""},{"lineNumber":116440,"originalJapaneseLine":"「火炎から言うことはなにもありません。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I have nothing to say from the Flame's side."},{"lineNumber":116441,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ユキちゃんが謝るまで絶対に口はききません」","translatedEnglishLine":"I absolutely will not speak until Yuki-chan apologizes.\""},{"lineNumber":116442,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほーん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmmm.\""},{"lineNumber":116443,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":116444,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだ、まだほっぺ膨らませてるのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What, are your cheeks still puffed up?\""},{"lineNumber":116445,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……いえ、違いますです。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...No, that's not it."},{"lineNumber":116446,"originalJapaneseLine":"　しょんぼり……してました」","translatedEnglishLine":"I was... feeling down.\""},{"lineNumber":116447,"originalJapaneseLine":"「本当は……仲直り、したいです……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The truth is... I want to make up...\""},{"lineNumber":116448,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でも、でも……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But, but...\""},{"lineNumber":116449,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":116450,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う〜〜……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uhh~~...\""},{"lineNumber":116451,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス総統、火炎、どうしたらいいですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Supreme Commander Rance, Flame, what should I do?\""},{"lineNumber":116452,"originalJapaneseLine":"「知らん、好きにしろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I don't know, do as you like.\""},{"lineNumber":116453,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うわ、他人事」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wow, you're acting like it's someone else's problem.\""},{"lineNumber":116454,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sigh...\""},{"lineNumber":116455,"originalJapaneseLine":"火炎書士はしょんぼりしたまま、","translatedEnglishLine":"The Flame Book Scholar remained dejected,"},{"lineNumber":116456,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふらふらと去って行った。","translatedEnglishLine":"and wandered away unsteadily."},{"lineNumber":116457,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ……心配ね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sigh... I'm worried...\""},{"lineNumber":116458,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よう。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey."},{"lineNumber":116459,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こういうのは珍しいのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Is this kind of thing unusual?\""},{"lineNumber":116460,"originalJapaneseLine":"「喧嘩くらいなら時折してますが……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"They have arguments occasionally, but..."},{"lineNumber":116461,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今回は長いですね」","translatedEnglishLine":"This time, it's been a long one.\""},{"lineNumber":116462,"originalJapaneseLine":"「放っておけばいいのよ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You just have to leave them alone,"},{"lineNumber":116463,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうせその内、けろっとしてるわよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"they'll be fine and over it before long anyhow.\""},{"lineNumber":116464,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……そうならいいけど」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I hope that's the case.\""},{"lineNumber":116465,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふーん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm?\""},{"lineNumber":116466,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んー？　ユキじゃないか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm? Isn't that Yuki?\""},{"lineNumber":116467,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちーっす。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey there."},{"lineNumber":116468,"originalJapaneseLine":"　歌って踊れるユキちゃんですよー。","translatedEnglishLine":"It's Yuki-chan who can sing and dance."},{"lineNumber":116469,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ウケケ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hehe.\""},{"lineNumber":116470,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前、こんなとこで何してるんだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What are you doing in a place like this?\""},{"lineNumber":116471,"originalJapaneseLine":"「コオロギ食ってた」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I was eating crickets.\""},{"lineNumber":116472,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":116473,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、冗談。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, just kidding."},{"lineNumber":116474,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さすがのユキちゃんも","translatedEnglishLine":"Even Yuki-chan,"},{"lineNumber":116475,"originalJapaneseLine":"　コオロギは食わないですよ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"doesn't eat crickets, you know?\""},{"lineNumber":116476,"originalJapaneseLine":"「食うならクワガタだよね」","translatedEnglishLine":"If anything, it'd be stag beetles, right?\""},{"lineNumber":116477,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":116478,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、引いてる、引いちゃってる？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, are you grossed out? Are you backing away?\""},{"lineNumber":116479,"originalJapaneseLine":"　やーい、また騙されてるー。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yay, you've been fooled again.\""},{"lineNumber":116480,"originalJapaneseLine":"　本当はクワガタも食べませーん☆」","translatedEnglishLine":"The truth is, I don't even eat stag beetles☆\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火炎書士とユキが絶交した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Flame Book Scholar and Yuki have broken off their friendship.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よう、その後ユキとは仲直りできたか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, have you managed to make up with Yuki since then?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、今、ほっぺ膨らませてました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, just now, your cheeks were puffed up."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……仮面があるから分からんわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I can't tell because of the mask."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「火炎から言うことはなにもありません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I have nothing to say from the Flame's side.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ユキちゃんが謝るまで絶対に口はききません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I absolutely will not speak until Yuki-chan apologizes."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだ、まだほっぺ膨らませてるのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What, are your cheeks still puffed up?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しょんぼり……してました」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The truth is... I want to make up..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス総統、火炎、どうしたらいいですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Supreme Commander Rance, Flame, what should I do?"
"I don't know, do as you like."
"Wow, you're acting like it's someone else's problem."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火炎書士はしょんぼりしたまま、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Flame Book Scholar remained dejected,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふらふらと去って行った。
こういうのは珍しいのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is this kind of thing unusual?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「喧嘩くらいなら時折してますが……

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This time, it's been a long one."
"You just have to leave them alone,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうせその内、けろっとしてるわよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they'll be fine and over it before long anyhow."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 歌って踊れるユキちゃんですよー。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's Yuki-chan who can sing and dance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前、こんなとこで何してるんだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What are you doing in a place like this?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さすがのユキちゃんも
コオロギは食わないですよ？」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If anything, it'd be stag beetles, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、引いてる、引いちゃってる？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, are you grossed out? Are you backing away?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やーい、また騙されてるー。
本当はクワガタも食べませーん☆」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The truth is, I don't even eat stag beetles☆"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よう、その後ユキとは仲直りできたか？」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、今、ほっぺ膨らませてました」

こういうのは珍しいのか？」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This time, it's been a long one."
